snippet.title: Mud and Blood Official Steam Teaser
snippet.description:
Thanks for being with us for more than 12 years. 

Flash is dead? Well, Mud and Blood will drop on steam more unfair, more brutal and more random than it ever been.

Wishlist us at: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1391530/Mud_and_Blood/
